summary: Beautiful Location!!! Home with everything u need and lots extras!!!
descriptionHtml:
---------------------------------------------------------------
------------ Waterfalls Retreat!!--------------
---------------------------------------------------------------

[youtube]ZsoI6xmxpc4[/youtube]
Video made by Hodilton

- To uptain the key of the Home u need to defeat the Cave troll inside the mine and other treaths proceed with caution, U can light up the fires its dark

- Location of the home is near Fort Amol, just follow the river up the mountain. U will find it between the waterfalls, Looking over the Eastmarch and Windhelm in the distance.

- U can clean the house using the broom.

- Layout : - Waterfalls Retreat 
               - A large basement
               - A secret cave under the Waterfall
               - All crafting u need outside the home
               - A personal mine
               - A small Treehouse home to even give more view of the Home and the Eastmarch
               - A Secret escape hatch near the garden it leads down into a cave, in the cave a complete small room to pass the time including a small forge.
               - A Nice pool
               - Small Garden
               - Campfire place to just chill and enjoy the view
               - Small location for the chicken near the campfire
               - Stable

- The Waterfalls Retreat has lots of extras the normal houses dont have. 
     - Turn on and off candles and fireplaces, Switch wallmount above the fireplace, Change the carpet under the stair, And lots of storage.
     - U can also switch bed style in the basements masterbedroom and in the house.
     - Practise dummys really increase weapon skills
     - Also contains a map of skyrim it can take u to all Citys on the map. 
     - Lots of weapon displays
     - Dragon Claw displays
     - Dragon Priest mask displays
     - The basement contains lots of Mannequins, A wallmount display, A kids room, follower room,
     - Master bedroom, a pool and bar, Crafting rooms, Storage room.
     - The Mine has all Ore u need to craft everything! The Ore will not run out after mining a few pieces
     - The secret cave under the waterfall does contain cheats!! Including becoming Werewolf or Vampire u can also cure both curses at the same place...
     - The Masterbedroom does contain a Waterfalls Retreat armor
     - A Personal guard of the home located on the walkway to the home, but dont piss himm off he will attack you..
     - Followers can go skinnydipping in the pools
     - A Giants club with the power of a true Giant. Once you hit someone they start flying lol.. Just for fun hehehe. U can find it in the Underfalls
     - Added a stable for the horse, and a oven near the campfire.

Full interactive for followers and children, dragons can land on the roofs and surroundings as well..

The screenshots are of low settings, i run an oldtimer, any better screenshots or videos are welcome..

-------- Wel for the rest its quite and simpel. --------

- Requirements 
      - Heartfire DLC
      - Update to last Mayb

-------------------------------------------------------------
author: Hardnekkig
